1750019562073766.name: Austere [AU] + Support: Skuggor [SE] + Hudsult
1750019562073766.formattedDate: Saturday, September 21, 2024 at 8:00 PM – 2:00 AM CEST
1750019562073766.description:
Australske Austere er tilbage efter 13 års pause og i den anledning skal de til Europa hvor de gæster Stengade og Danmark for første gang! 

Austere:
"Beneath the Threshold" represents AUSTERE in the here and now. With their fourth full-length the Australians have taken a long step into the present and embrace their musical future in a way that might have been expected after a 13-year hiatus.

When their voluntary break ended with the release of "Corrosion of Hearts" in 2023, the duo consisting of Mitchell Keepin and Tim Yatras returned with a more mature and defined version of their own particular style of black metal, which reflected both their greater experience and evolution as artists. Both musicians had been active in other bands during the hiatus of AUSTERE.

While "Corrosion of Hearts" formed the bridge between the band's musical history and the artists' fresh vision, "Beneath the Threshold" takes a leap of expression. AUSTERE's sonic heritage is still alive. Even though their roots in early Norse black metal and its depressive Scandinavian offspring continue to shine through, it is also apparent that the Australians have audibly strengthened their emotional expressiveness and previous blackgaze leanings beyond the point where a stylistic shift towards the latter needs to be diagnosed.

On "Beneath the Threshold", AUSTERE offer more hooks and melodic harmonies to complement the multi-layered, harsh and dreamlike guitar textures expertly woven by Keepin with the aid of Yatras' emotive drumming. This development is emphasised by a suitable production that lets each of the elements shine and does not try to blur the riffs.

https://open.spotify.com/artist/7gyVPCoE80rSyEW6yuJ6HM?si=eh1vVCuDRiK4oHnKCX4vxg
https://www.facebook.com/OfficialAustere
https://www.instagram.com/official_austere/

+ Support: Skuggor

Skuggor:
Skuggor is an ambient Black Metal band based in Sweden. Their second album "Whispers of Ancient Spells" was released in March 2024 by Naturmacht Productions. 

With Whispers of Ancient Spells Swedish-based one-man project Skuggor invites listeners to traverse realms of darkness, mist and myth. Guided by the hypnotic melodies that echo through the corridors of ancient forests, each track is a chapter in exploring shadows of the past.

https://skuggor.bandcamp.com/

Hudsult:
Hudsult er en ny aarhusiansk kvartet, der med udgangspunkt i screamo-genrens støj og post hardcoreens introspektive lyd, forsøger at udtrykke den sorg, frustration og vrede der kendetegner livet i det senmoderne samfund.
De er et band, der lige så gerne vil se folk græde som moshe - og de spiller musik til anledningen.

https://www.facebook.com/profile.php?id=100091142529595
https://hudsult-aarhus.bandcamp.com/album/old-songs-spring-summer-2023
https://open.spotify.com/artist/1uddRMVBtQFa2OGrXHa7WN?si=sGvJjv1hToG5ceqKsuKcbw
---------------------------------------------------------
Entry: 125 kr (limited amount early bird on sale until 4th of April or sold out) / 150 kr normal pre-sale / 170 kr at the door.
Tickets: https://bit.ly/3TLfzO7

kk-debut-fest-nonstop-feeding-the-kitty.name: Debut Fest - Nonstop Feeding The Kitty
kk-debut-fest-nonstop-feeding-the-kitty.description:
We at Nonstop Feeding The Kitty would like to explore intimacy, time, and food. We are focused on microwaves, ready-made meals, and the communal meal. Through this residency, we aim to investigate: what happens to the gastronomic experience when mutual presence is lacking? We wish to explore what it does to us when we allow ourselves to give time and love to the food and let the food embrace us like a warm hug. A ritual or a communal meal over which we gather, where love, time, and gratitude are the essence. What is the communal meal without these concepts?

We want to investigate where the presence has disappeared to if it is neither found around the dining table nor in the intimate. We do not believe it has vanished, but we would like to find glimpses and moments where presence is evident and highlight it.

In cooperation with Playwrighter: Trine Thostrup

Musician: Erik Storgaard

Actor: Minna Søberg Kristensen

Actor: Sarah Sieben

Actor: Liva Lykke Friis

kk-tengger-jpkr.name: TENGGER (JP/KR)
kk-tengger-jpkr.description:
T E N G G E R is a traveling musical family, made up of Pan-Asian couple, ITTA (from South Korea) and MARQIDO (from Japan), who create their brand of psychedelic New-Age drone magic through the use of Voice, Indian harmonium, and Toy instruments (played by ITTA) and synths & electronics (played by MARQIDO).

The duo originally started out with the moniker “10” but since the birth of their son RAAI (who joins them on tour and playing Voice, Synth, Toy Instrument, Dance performance on stage) in 2012, have called themselves TENGGER (meaning ‘unlimited expanse of sky’ in Mongolian) to mark the expansion of the

family. It also means ‘huge sea’ in Hungarian.

Travel, as spiritual experience in real environments, and the sound between the space and the audience have been central themes of their works. The family’s yearly pilgrimages inform every aspect of their art.

Pitchfork: "From field recordings to Krautrock to something they call 'aural hang-gliding', TENGGER have truly begun to put their stamp on psychedelic music."

Uncut Magazine: "There's a level of detail in TENGGER's music that sets them apart from other drone artists, sounds nimbly woven together rather than painted in broad brushstrokes."

Bandcamp Daily: "...like stepping through a glowing portal and gasping at the wonders of another world”

Stereogum: "Their shimmering synthesizers and reverberant chants invoke the most ethereal end of krautrock..."

kk-felt-huset-presents-civilistjavel-soc.name: FELT & HUSET presents: Civilistjävel + soccer Committee + Thommy Wahlström
kk-felt-huset-presents-civilistjavel-soc.description:
In celebration of the release of Civilistjävel!'s new album Brödföda, FELT presents an evening of live music at Musikcaféen in Copenhagen on Friday 13th September.

Tomas Bodén is a revered figure of the aural murk, known primarily for his work as Civilistjävel. It’s an alias that has spawned a catalogue of self-released peculiarities, featuring music that scorns traditional form, instead opting for unfussed symphonies of ice-hued minimalism; soft murmurs that emanate from his studio in the High Coast of Sweden.

soccer Committee is the solo project of Dutch artist, Mariska Baars. She grew up in the countryside of The Netherlands listening to the magical sounds of the river near her childhood home. These peaceful, organic sounds have made their way into her music. Her style is often described as a natural, unforced blend of experimental, folk, ambient and electronics, created with electric guitar, voice and effects.

Thommy Wahlström is a Swedish composer and musician educated in Composition/EAM at the Gotland School of Music Composition and the Royal College of Music in Stockholm. Wahlströms music is often a combination of acoustic and electroacoustic music. In recent years, he has been concentrating on combining traditional notation with an ”alternative representation of sound and music”, which refers to the development of graphic scores.

kk-anna-maehl-ninna-lundberg.name: Anna Maehl + Ninna Lundberg
kk-anna-maehl-ninna-lundberg.description:
Anna Maehl:

With her playful productions and intimate vocals, Danish producer and singer Anna Maehl creates an art pop universe of her own. In 2023 Anna Maehl was selected for the Belgian radio contest De Nieuwe Lichting (earlier finalists count Tamino and The Haunted Youth) with her first single Youth Song. Same year Youth Song was featured in the Belgian youth series Knokke Off (VRT, Netflix Global) and she played her concert debut at the Danish showcase UHOERT. In June 2024, she released her second single Carolyn, released on French label La Taniere.

Ninna Lundberg:

"When Lundberg's crystal-clear and soulful vocals, along with the band's phenomenal harmonies, are introduced, every hair on my arms stands on end... I am completely absorbed by the music. It's ambient yet folk-like. It sounds simultaneously bleak and like a beautiful spring morning. It's poetic and truly touching. So touching, in fact, that I shed a little tear."

From GAFFA review of Ninna Lundberg and band at Northern Winter Beat 2023.



After great success with the band Ganger, Ninna Lundberg released her debut album "Two Two of You" in 2022. The album is a collection of experimental songs and personal narratives carried by her sensitive and raw vocals, set against a backdrop of dusty piano melodies and dynamic brass and string arrangements.

In live performances, Ninna collaborates with saxophonist Viktor Kongsbak, double bassist Thorbjørn Kaas, and musician/singer Mille Mejer Djernæs Christensen. Together, they perform songs from Ninna's debut album alongside new material enveloped in beautiful, organic arrangements that effortlessly traverse between the grandiose and atmospheric and the very close and intimate.

kk-flors-klang-for-klima.name: FLORS: KLANG FOR KLIMA
kk-flors-klang-for-klima.description:
Join us for a day of concerts, talks and infoshops about hopeful climate activism.

13.00 Opening

14.00 Talk by Den Grønne Ungdomsbevægelse

15.15 Concert (TBA)

16.15 Concert w. Blåregn

17.00 End

The event is free and supported by Tuborgfondet

kk-uniradioen-praesenterer-pallas-agnes-.name: Uniradioen Præsenterer: PALLAS & Agnes Ea
kk-uniradioen-praesenterer-pallas-agnes-.description:
ENGELSK:

UNIRADIOEN PRESENTS is a recurring live event where Uniradioen, in collaboration with HUSET and Musikcaféen, showcases emerging Danish musicians that we highly recommend keeping an eye on.

The ticket prices are student-friendly, the music is exceptional, and the drinks are ice-cold!

PALLAS:

PALLAS is making waves on the Danish music scene, and with two EP releases under her belt and being selected for DR P3's Karrierekanonen 2024, she has already established herself as someone to watch. She operates in a captivating intersection between electronic indie and internationally flavored hyperpop. Carefree melancholy and lyrics about everything from heartbreak and depression to killing time and escapism adorn her explosive productions and engaging grooves. PALLAS creates a contrasting universe where time and place merge, and where anything is possible.

Agnes Ea:

Uniradioen first noticed Agnes Ea when she released her single "Mere Sommer," which became their "Unikum of the Week." Since then, she has released her debut EP "Intet forsvinder," which Politiken awarded 4 hearts, and Lucia Odoom described as "spring-friendly electronic pop in the ears" with "dreamy lyrics bordering on poetry" in her review.

At Huset, you can hear her Danish-language songs about friendships, nature, love, and times of crisis in a raw solo format, where the lyrics take center stage.

kk-ecology-cocktails.name: Ecology & Cocktails
kk-ecology-cocktails.description:
Join us for an unforgettable evening of inspiration at Ecology & Cocktails, an event designed to bridge the gap between the world of ecological research and the world of social gatherings. This unique gathering promises a dynamic blend of knowledge, networking, and, of course, delicious cocktails.

Our Special Guest Speaker: Mogens Trolle

We are thrilled to kick off the event with a keynote address by Mogens Trolle, a Danish wildlife photographer, zoologist, mammal researcher, author and winner of the best animal portrait in Wildlife Photographer of the Year in 2020.

For the last decade Mogens has been on a quest to take portraits of wild primates, capturing their facial expressions, emotions and unique personalities. In his talk, Mogens will give insights into how the highly advanced facial expressions of these intelligent close relatives of ours relate to their evolution, social organization and brain size in intricate ways that point directly at ourselves, the human species.

Ecology Open Mic Night

We will then transition into the Ecology Open Mic Night, a platform that welcomes scientists of all levels to share their research in a more informal and engaging setting. Whether you're a seasoned expert or a budding ecologist, you'll have the chance to express your passion for the natural world and showcase your discoveries. This is the moment for all voices in the field to be heard.

Interactive Ecology Activities

As the night progresses, you'll have the opportunity to engage in various interactive activities that dive deeper into ecology topics. In smaller groups, you can discuss, brainstorm, and collaborate on ecological issues, fostering a sense of community among like-minded individuals.

Cheers to Ecology! 🍷

Of course, no event called "Ecology & Cocktails" would be complete without the drinks to match. Throughout the evening, enjoy a curated selection of cocktails.

kk-napoleon-solo-40-ars-jubilaeum.name: Napoleon Solo: 40-års jubilæum
kk-napoleon-solo-40-ars-jubilaeum.description:
Musikcafeen holds a special significance for Napoleon Solo, who played more than 25 sold-out concerts there during the 80s and 90s. Napoleon Solo was even named Band of the Month at Musikcaffen in January 1986 and received the John of the Year award in 1989. Anecdotes from that period are plentiful. Therefore, it is with great pleasure that Napoleon Solo returns to Musikcafeen on the very day of the anniversary to deliver a spectacular party for old and new fans alike. As tradition dictates, surprises may occur.

Napoleon Solo, which began in 1984, is one of Denmark's oldest ska bands. Ever since, the band, known for its lively and stylish performances, has delivered solid ska with a touch of reggae and soul to both Danish and international audiences.

The band played its first concert outside Denmark in 1986. In 1988, the band performed at The London International Ska Festival and released the EP "How To Steal The World" featuring the catchy tune "I Don’t Believe You." At that time, the English magazine New Musical Express named Napoleon Solo one of the ten best ska bands in the world.

In 1989, the album "Shot!" was released, with hits like "Trains & Buses," "Always Friday," and "Baby Elephant Walk." This marked the beginning of several tours in Denmark, Germany, and England, including with the English band Bad Manners.

As the only Scandinavian band, Napoleon Solo performed again at The London International Ska Festival in 2011. That same year, "Shot!" was re-released, and Napoleon Solo performed with The Specials in Copenhagen.

In 2018, Napoleon Solo released the album "Open Channel D" with classics like "Nobody Told Me" and newer material like "Hot as Ice" on German Pork Pie Records and American Jump Up Records.

In 2019, the group celebrated its 35th anniversary at the This Is Ska Festival in Germany, and in 2021, they were one of the headliners at the German festival Ska is Back in Town. Last year, Napoleon Solo participated in a memorial concert for The Specials’ lead singer Terry Hall at Loppen.

Napoleon Solo still consists of: Søren Ole Christensen (vocals), Jasper Holst Jørgensen (vocals/guitar), Sonny Henry Rasmussen (guitar), Poul Siersbæk (bass), Jens Wennecke (drums), Jacob Palitzsch (organ), René Dreyer (guitar), Jack Rothe (alto and tenor saxophone), and Hans Nybo (tenor and baritone saxophone).

kk-paere-banal-ondskyld.name: pære banal + Ondskyld
kk-paere-banal-ondskyld.description:
pære banal is a post-punk trio based in Copenhagen. Comprised of energetic and angular tunes driven forward by off-kilter riffs, staccato beats, and distorted vocals; their music evokes an uncontrollable urge to ride your bike as fast as you can, and whilst at full speed; have a laugh at the absurdities of status quo.

With their uniformized live concerts and tight interplay pære banal bring an unmatched energy to their live shows, with unexpected breaks and abrupt tempo changes that leave listeners in a confused euphoria.

kk-huset-x-loppen-gurriers-ie.name: HUSET x Loppen: Gurriers (IE)
kk-huset-x-loppen-gurriers-ie.description:
Gurriers was created in the middle of the lockdowns during the pandemic, claiming their place as the newest addition to Dublin’s alternative music scene with their mix of post-punk, noise and shoegaze. Gurriers is made up of a tightly knitted and loud gang of five consisting of the members Dan Hoff, Emmet White, Ben O’Neill, Mark MacCormack and Pierce Callaghan who have managed to refine the art of being both friends, roommates and colleagues all at once.

During the last two years the Gurriers have expanded on their dangerously addictive sound, which have culminated in two singles, opening gigs for Goat Girl and Enola Gay and sold out shows at the famous London club Brixton Windmill.

The band describes their live shows as unruly, loud and turbulent, driven by a suppressed need to perform during their long stay in their rehearsal space under the pandemic.

We are ready for Gurriers blowing off the roof of Huset! Are you?

kk-charlotte-amalie.name: Charlotte-Amalie
kk-charlotte-amalie.description:
Charlotte-Amalie announces the debut album "Opbrud" with an autumn tour

The Danish-language artist Charlotte-Amalie is ready with her long-awaited cinematic debut album "Opbrud," and is going on an autumn tour in November, where she will perform the album in its entirety with her live band behind her.

Charlotte-Amalie's music is known for its cinematic pop sound, and the album marks a musical journey where she invites the listener into a cinematic piano universe filled with strong emotions and deeply personal stories. Through the album's total of 10 songs, "Opbrud" depicts a constant struggle between understanding and accepting oneself in the face of life's trials. Despite the dark moments, the thread of hope and optimism shines through and invites the listener on an emotional excursion that both explores and challenges.

"The album is a raw and honest story about life's ups and downs, and the realizations and values ​​you learn as you get older and get to know yourself. It is a disruption of the old, and a description of the process in creating a new starting point. The lyrics move from self-observation and self-insight to optimism and hope, and embrace both the bright and dark sides of life, where light gets its meaning from darkness" says Charlotte-Amalie

After giving samples of the album as support for e.g. Søren Huss and Rigmor, the upcoming songwriter is now ready to present "Opbrud" in an intimate setting.

kk-klaus-johann-grobe-ch.name: Klaus Johann Grobe (CH)
kk-klaus-johann-grobe-ch.description:
Klaus Johann Grobe are a Swiss duo who often sing in German and have their roots in a vintage Krautrock style, using bass, synths, and drums to craft a sound both familiar and modern. After the release of their first LP, Im Sinne der Zeit, in 2014, they expanded their vintage-leaning sound to incorporate disco and chillwave (on 2016's Spagat der Liebe) then R&B and soft rock (on 2018's Du Bist So Symmetrisch) before moving into even more relaxed, cinematic songwriting with hints of jazz fusion on their melancholic fourth album, 2024's Io Tu il loro.

«Io tu il loro» is a record that cannot be done by endlessly fiddling around with hundreds of ideas and sounds. All it needed was a real break (Dani and Sevi didn’t work on any Grobe related stuff until they met up in the mountains in 2022).

It’s an album with a blurry vision and soft limitations. You can somehow feel them looking back on all their work forgivingly and then moving on to what felt right.

So here we are with nine tracks full of embracing warmth, so melancholicly welcoming you don’t know if you want to smile or cry. Some might call it timeless, some might call it dad-rock... well, it certainly isn’t disco for the masses, it’s more like, «If I can’t make myself dance after four beers, I can as well go home.»

So, no disco? No syncopated synths? No German? No reverb? Where’s The Grobe?

Take your time, you’ll notice Klaus Johann Grobe aren’t gone, they just took a turn before driving yet into another unknown

kk-cumgirl8-us.name: cumgirl8 (US)
kk-cumgirl8-us.description:
cumgirl8 met in a sex chat 8000 years ago in another metaverse. Made up of Lida Fox (bass), Veronika Vilim (guitar), Chase Lombardo (drums) and Avishag Rodrigues (guitar), the band render the immersive and chaotic energy from cyberspace into our world, coming together to make a boundary-less sound that brilliantly stretches across the likes of ESG, Cocteau Twins, Suicide, CSS, B-52s, The Shangri-Las, Chris & Cosey, Madonna, and many more.



Last year, cumgirl8 shared their debut 4AD EP phantasea pharm, recorded, mixed, and mastered entirely from analog tape. The six-track EP followed stand-alone single ‘dumb bitch’(2022) and their two other EPs, cumgirl8 (2020) and RIPcumgirl8 (2021). As much as the music itself, cumgirl8’s incendiary live performances are brilliantly chaotic and emblematic of the spirit of New York performance art. Last year, the

band played a sold-out show at New York’s newest venue Knitting Factory at Baker Falls (formerly The Pyramid Club), a stint supporting Le Tigre on a sold-out Canadian run, a headline EU/UK tour, and a festival run that included spots at Primavera, The Great Escape, Greenman, Core Festival, Loose Ends, and

Pitchfork Paris just to name a few.

898834472071003.name: fyraften: åben fredagsbar + performance af Lueenas
898834472071003.formattedDate: Friday, September 6, 2024 at 4:00 PM – 8:00 PM CEST
898834472071003.description:
Klar til fyraften? Weekenden banker på og vi slår havedørene op til fredagsbar i villaens herskabelige rammer. Der er fri entré, når vi fejrer endnu en veloverstået arbejdsuge med kolde bobler, sprød musik og kunstneriske indspark. Hver gang kan du opleve et kurateret indslag i skæringspunktet mellem koncert, performance og installationskunst - og få nye vinkler på din fredag eftermiddag. Baren holder åbent med gode priser på naturvin og økologiske øl. Vi ses til fyraften!

Denne fredag er vi stolte af at kunne præsentere en performance af den eksperimenterende strygerduo Lueenas. Som et selverklæret filmmusikband har duoen - bestående af violinist Maria Jagd og kontrabassist Ida Duelund - sine rødder i såvel klassisk minimalisme som improviseret rockmusik. Med forstærkere og effekter forvandler de strenginstrumenternes organiske teksturer til ulmende, støjende kompositioner, der straks fremkalder storladne billeder for det indre blik. Netop derfor har Lueenas på få år vundet anerkendelse i både film- og musikkredse, inklusiv en nominering til DMA Jazz for debutalbummet ‘Lueenas’ og en Robert-nominering for deres score til filmen ‘Ønskebarn’.

fyraften: åben fredagsbar + performance af Lueenas
Fredag 6/9-24 kl. 16.00 - 20.00
Villa Kultur, Krausesvej 3, 2100 København Ø
Pris: Fri entré

Program

16.00: Dørene åbner
17.00: Performance af Lueenas
20.00: Tak for i aften

Arrangementet er muliggjort med støtte fra Københavns Kommune.

3736799039908780.name: Åben have: Koncert og udstilling af NEBULAH og Annabel Hett
3736799039908780.formattedDate: Friday, September 13, 2024 at 7:30 PM – 10:00 PM CEST
3736799039908780.description:
Koncert og udstilling af NEBULAH og Annabel Hett

Villa Kultur og Åben Festival slår havedørene op og inviterer til koncert og kunstudstilling i grønne omgivelser. Oplev art rock-gruppen NEBULAH og tekstilkunstner Annabel Hett i et kunstnerisk samarbejde, der udforsker balancen mellem mennesket i naturen - og naturen i mennesket.

Program

19.30: Dørene åbner + udstilling af Annabel Hett
21.00: Koncert med NEBULAH
23.00: Tak for i aften

Der er fri entré til arrangementet, men da der er begrænsede pladser, anbefaler vi alle at ankomme i god tid. Vi gør opmærksom på, at både koncert og udstilling også kan opleves søndag den 15. september kl. 14.00.


Læs mere om oplevelsen og samarbejdet bag nederst i beskrivelsen.


OM ÅBEN FESTIVAL
Åben Festival er hele Østerbro og Nordhavns samfundsbevidste bydelsfestival.

Festivalen inviterer som sædvanlig til fest og fejring med opfordringen; gå åbent til verden, lad dig begejstre og mød dine naboer omkring kunst og kulturoplevelser.

Til årets festival er de små de store, når vi som gallerne bunder trylledrikken og rejser os mod global kassetænkning, ensretning og nødvendighed. Vores lokale modsvar er en perlerække af pop up-oplevelser rundt omkring på Østerbro og Nordhavn.

Så kom og vær med til at fejre kunst og kulturel mangfoldighed, når vi sammen skaber en bydel, hvor frirum, fejring og fællesskab hersker for en weekend.


TILGÆNGELIGHED
Åben Festival er optaget af at skabe størst mulig tilgængelighed og inklusion, så alle føler sig velkomne. Vi arbejder derfor på at mindske barriererne for deltagelse og øge oplevelsen af både fysisk, mental og social tilgængelighed.

Vi sørger for at kommunikere tilgangsforhold på de enkelte begivenheder, men som lille, frivillig forening, der arbejder med pop up-oplevelser, kan der være blind spots.

Kontakt os gerne, hvis du har spørgsmål eller kommentarer til vores tilgængelighedsformidling.
Vi ønsker alle en god festival.


TILGANGSFORHOLD VILLA KULTUR
✓ Lift / rampe / niveaufrit til indgang
x Handicaptoilet i bygningen eller handicaptoilet inden for 200 meter af bygningen
✓ Handicapparkering
✓ Gratis adgang for ledsager
✓ Mulighed for at spise / drikke på stedet
✓ Stole / bænke man kan hvile sig på
x Mulighed for alternativ deltagelse (ex. podcast, teams-deltagelse mm.)


MERE OM ARRANGEMENTET
Der er mørke naturkræfter på færde i NEBULAHs sfæriske art rock. Bag de luftige vokalharmonier og sarte guitarmotiver trækker det op til uvejr - fra sagte, blikstille passager til stormfulde omkvæd. Naturens uregerlighed danner også afsæt for gruppens tekster, der kredser om de utæmmelige fænomener, som omgiver os - og hvordan de forplanter sig i vores eget indre. Et udtryk, der bl.a. har båret frugt i form af spilletid på P6 BEAT, omtale i GAFFA og en optræden på årets SPOT Festival.

Til denne koncert er rammerne skabt i samarbejde med kunstner Annabel Hett, som vil opføre et installationsværk i villaens orangeri. I sin praksis arbejder Annabel på tværs af både medier og materialer med rod i temaer som transformation, oversættelse og tekstur. Med en baggrund i tekstilkunst - herunder studier i tekstil- og materialedesign på Weißensee Kunsthochschule Berlin - henter hun inspiration i naturen og i naturlige materialer, hvorfor alle de udstillede tekstiler er skabt af affaldsprodukter.


Om samarbejdet udtaler NEBULAH og Annabel Hett

»Naturkræfter regerer uden retfærdighedsprincip og mennesket kan føle lige så stor magtesløshed som meningsfuldhed i mødet med naturen. Menneskeheden har i flere århundreder overtaget handlingsrummet på Jorden og udnyttet dens ressourcer. Vi mærker nu et fundamentalt skifte i forholdet mellem planeten og mennesket med kaotiske og uforståelige konsekvenser. Denne koncert og udstilling skildrer nutidens brutalitet og skrøbelighed i mørkt håb om, at naturen igen vil regere, men også de dilemmaer og menneskelige kriser, der følger.«


Arrangementet er muliggjort med støtte fra Københavns Kommune.

1027467919087680.name: Along Projects x Rose Svane: Garnbølger
1027467919087680.formattedDate: Monday, September 16, 2024 at 6:30 PM – 9:30 PM CEST
1027467919087680.description:
Greb du også garnet under lockdown? For mange af os blev håndarbejde en måde at finde ro, udvikle os selv og skabe forbindelse til andre – selv når vi var adskilt.

I samarbejde med hækleguru Rose Svane inviterer Along Projects dig til event-serien Garnbølger i Villa Kultur. Gennem inspirerende talks og kreative workshops vil vi udforske håndarbejdets potentiale og dets unikke evne til at binde mennesker sammen.

Over fire efterårsaftener vil Rose i selskab med en række spændende samtalepartnere – Kris Jensen fra Følsomt Broderi, Elise Bromann Bukhave, Anita Jensen og Hannah Amalie Nielsen – dykke ned i temaer, der spænder over kunst, sundhed og bæredygtighed.

Hver aften inkluderer en workshop faciliteret af Along, hvor deltagerne lærer at lave garn af genbrugsmaterialer og hækle med det. Resultatet bliver et fælles kunstværk skabt af over 400 deltagere, som vil blive anerkendt som kunstnere, når det fiskegarnsinspirerede net udstilles i Ringkøbing Rådhushal i marts 2025. Alle kan være med – ingen erfaring er nødvendig.

Kom alene eller tag vennerne med. Lad os sammen (gen)opdage glæden ved håndarbejde og de bånd, det skaber! 🧶🌊


Program

#1: Mandag 16/9-24
Kris Jensen (Følsomt Broderi): Håndarbejde som udtryksform for identitet, håb og hverdagsaktivisme

#2: Torsdag 3/10-24
Anita Jensen (PhD og forsker i kunst, kultur og sundhed): Det unyttige er nyttigt

#3: Mandag 14/10-24
Hannah Amalie Nielsen (billedkunstner): Bæredygtige kunstpraksisser

#4: Onsdag 30/10-24
Elise Bromann Bukhave (PhD, ergoterapeut, medstifter af Center for Craft og Sundhedsfremme): Sundhed og trivsel gennem craft-aktiviteter


Tidsplan

18.30: Workshop starter
19.30: Talk
21.30: Tak for i dag

Alle events foregår på dansk. Hæklenåle, sakse og workshop-materialer stilles til rådighed, men du er velkommen til at medbringe dit eget restgarn eller din yndlingshæklenål.


Find billetter til Garnbølger

#1: https://tinyurl.com/yda5r8yh

#2: https://tinyurl.com/4xktvdhs

#3: https://tinyurl.com/yzz9d4ur

 #4: https://tinyurl.com/mvswfbw6

Hvert event i serien har plads til 30 deltagere.
kl. 18.30 - 21.30 (dørene åbner kl. 18.00)
Villa Kultur, Krausesvej 3, 2100 København Ø
Pris: 160 DKK


Event-serien er skabt af Along Projects og er en del af baggården - en programrække af og for vækstlagets kulturskabere. baggården er muliggjort med støtte fra Københavns Kommune. Garnbølger er desuden støttet af Ringkøbing-Skjern Kommune.


Om Along Projects

Along er en samarbejdsplatform for eksperimenterende kunst, drevet af kurator Rikke Bank, kunstner Roe Ly og kreativ kommunikatør Karoline Ellekær Bisgaard. Vi tror på, at samvær skaber noget unikt, og at vi sammen kan skabe noget, der ikke kunne opstå alene. Vores mål er at etablere mødesteder mellem forskellige perspektiver, tilgange og materialer. Blandt andet giver Along uetablerede, unge danske og internationale kunstnere og kuratorer mulighed for at prøve kræfter med det nyskabende udstillingsformat “1+1=3”, hvor man samarbejder i par om en åben og testende proces.

Følg med på Instagram: @longprojects


Om Rose Svane

Rose Svane bringer nyt liv til det traditionelle håndværk med sine farverige hækleprojekter. For Rose er hækling ikke blot et håndværk, men en kunstform og et redskab til selvomsorg, som har hjulpet hende med at bearbejde hjertesorg, finde ro og skabe en dybere forbindelse til sin krop.

7743357175773391.name: benspænd: Slalum
7743357175773391.description:
Slalum vader ind på den danske hiphop-scene med overskud i metermål. Faktisk er det svært at tro, at den 21-årige rapper, der er en del af kunst- og musikkollektivet HVAD CRU, kun netop er sprunget ud som soloartist: Hendes flabede rim, overlegne vokalteknik og virtuose beats vidner om en rutine, som kan måle sig med genrens mest garvede udøvere. Den ubesværede attitude kommer ikke mindst til udtryk live, hvor Slalum leverer sine kontante vers med et stort band i ryggen.

Denne aften hæver Slalum ambitionerne yderligere og nyfortolker sine sange i alternative versioner med bl.a. cello, saxofon, percussion og live-cuts - med et par afstikkere til HVAD CRUs bagkatalog.

‘benspænd’ er Villa Kulturs koncertprogram for ung dansk musik. Med koncerterne ønsker vi at hylde den kreativitet og alsidighed, som musikkens vækstlag gemmer på. Ved at udstyre alle artister med et kunstnerisk benspænd for deres optræden er det vores ambition at udvikle en nyskabende platform for musikkens talenter - og samtidig gøde jorden for nye og alternative lytteoplevelser.

Find billetter via dette link:

https://www.villakultur.dk/happenings-kalender/benspnd-slalum

benspænd: Slalum
Onsdag 18/9-24 kl. 20.00 (dørene åbner kl. 19.30)
Villa Kultur, Krausesvej 3, 2100 København Ø
Pris: 90 kr.

Koncerten er muliggjort med støtte fra Københavns Kommune og Statens Kunstfond.

359239433901372.name: CULTURE KICKS BACK 2024 💥 2.-3. OKTOBER I AARHUS // INSTITUT FOR (X) & FRONTLØBERNE
359239433901372.formattedDate: Oct 2 at 9:30 AM – Oct 3 at 11:00 PM CEST
359239433901372.description:
/// ENGLISH VERSION BELOW ///

𝗖𝗨𝗟𝗧𝗨𝗥𝗘 𝗞𝗜𝗖𝗞𝗦 𝗕𝗔𝗖𝗞 𝟮𝟬𝟮𝟰 KOMMER TIL AARHUS! 💥

Glæd dig til årets store faglige fest, når vi over to dage i oktober samler kunst- og kulturbranchens skarpeste hoveder til en samtale om og med kunsten og kulturens vækstlag. I år skal vi blive klogere på, hvordan vi skaber gode rammer for fremtidens arbejdsliv i kulturbranchen og på opdagelse i det aarhusianske vækstlag. 

👉 Læs mere herunder, eller besøg vores website http://www.culturekicksback.dk for et fuldt overblik. 


𝗗𝗔𝗚 #𝟭 - 𝗣𝗔̊ 𝗢𝗣𝗗𝗔𝗚𝗘𝗟𝗦𝗘 𝗜 𝗩Æ𝗞𝗦𝗧𝗟𝗔𝗚𝗘𝗧 // 𝗙𝗥𝗢𝗡𝗧𝗟Ø𝗕𝗘𝗥𝗡𝗘 & 𝗦𝗬𝗗𝗛𝗔𝗩𝗡𝗘𝗡 🐛
Det syder og bobler i det aarhusianske vækstlag. Derfor inviterer vi på første dag af CKB på opdagelse bag facaden og kommer helt med ind i maskinrummet hos nogle af de førende og mest progressive aktører i vækstlaget. 

På konferencens første dag kan du også glæde dig til spændende oplæg om  vækstlaget gennem generationer, samt hvad der sker, når de etablerede institutioner går ind og støtter og arbejder med aktører i vækstlaget. Dagen afsluttes med en keynote af det kunstneriske multitalent Esben Weile Kjær, som fortæller om sin rejse fra de aarhusianske vækstlag til sit gennembrud. Aftenen sluttes af med en eventyrlig fællesspisning med madkollektivet De 7 Munde, som akkompagneres af Kaosteater, på spillestedet Turkis. Dét vil du ikke gå glip af! 


𝗗𝗔𝗚 #𝟮 - 𝗘𝗡 𝗡𝗔𝗧𝗜𝗢𝗡𝗔𝗟 𝗦𝗔𝗠𝗧𝗔𝗟𝗘 // 𝗜𝗡𝗦𝗧𝗜𝗧𝗨𝗧 𝗙𝗢𝗥 (𝗫) & 𝗚𝗢𝗗𝗦𝗕𝗔𝗡𝗘𝗡 🌍
På andendagen rykker vi fra Sydhavnen til Godsbanen, hvor vi inviterer til en national samtale om – og med – kulturens vækstlag. Her spørger vi bl.a. om, hvordan vi sikrer at det kreative vækstlag og de små kulturaktører også i fremtiden får en plads i byerne?

På dag #2 kan du også se frem til at møde en lang række prominente aktører fra både ind- og udland, som i spændnede samtaler og break-out sessions. Her kommer keynotes fra Club Commission Berlin, som har organiseret den berlinske nattelivsscene og du kan høre om, hvordan Sounds Right-projektet har givet naturen sin anerkendelse som kunstner tilbage. Derudover kan du også i en lang række spændende break out sessions med spændende aktører fra alle afkroge af Kulturdanmark. Og, for det ikke skal være løgn: Aftenen byder vi på musik og dans med Favorite Things. Glæd jer! 


OBS: Som noget nyt har vi i år opdelt konferencen i to selvstændige dage, som kan opleves enten samlet eller hver for sig. Vi håber selvfølgelig, du vil være med begge dage!


🔸 𝗞𝗘𝗬𝗡𝗢𝗧𝗘𝗦: Esben Weile Kjær (Kunstner) - Emiko Gejic (Club Commission Berlin), Annesofie Norn (UN Live x Sounds Right).

🔸 𝗗𝗘𝗕𝗔𝗧𝗧𝗘𝗥: Anna Malzer (Mungo Park), Uffe Elbæk (Senior Troublemaker), Esben Danielsen (Kulturens Analyseinstitut), Mathias Findalen (Tuborgfondet), Thomas Kruse (kunstner og aktivist), Mads Peter Laursen (Institut for (X)), Camilla Aneto (Frontløberne) & mange flere.

🔸 𝗕𝗥𝗘𝗔𝗞 𝗢𝗨𝗧 𝗦𝗘𝗦𝗦𝗜𝗢𝗡𝗦: Bikubenfonden x Kunstens Stemmer, DM - Kultur x KULTURAM, Aarhus Volume, ARoS, Kulbroen, Sydhans, Kulbroen, Club Curious, Teater Fluks, Kaospilot, Palmehaven & mange flere. 


𝙇æ𝙨 𝙢𝙚𝙧𝙚 𝙤𝙜 𝙨𝙚 𝙙𝙚𝙩 𝙛𝙪𝙡𝙙𝙚 𝙥𝙧𝙤𝙜𝙧𝙖𝙢 𝙥𝙖̊:  http://www.culturekicksback.dk 

🎟 𝙆ø𝙗 𝙙𝙞𝙣 𝙗𝙞𝙡𝙡𝙚𝙩 𝙣𝙪:
1-dags billetter fra 325-800 kr: 

2-dags billetter fra 400 - 1200 kr: 


Vi ses i Aarhus 🙌

Hvem har hjulpet CKB ‘24 til verden?

💪 Culture Kicks Back 2024 er arrangeret af Kulturens Selvstændige - en sammenslutning af Frontløberne, Institut for (X), Filmhus Fyn, URBAN 13 og Villa Kultur.

🫶🏻 Culture Kicks Back 2024’s økonomiske partnere er Tuborgfondet og Aarhus Kommune.
💫 Indholdspartnere: DM Kultur x KULTURAM, Kulturens Analyseinstitut, Bikubenfonden.

🌟 Venuepartnere: Godsbanen og Turkis.


________________________________________________________


::: ENGLISH VERSION ::: 

Soon we will open the doors to this year's 𝗖𝘂𝗹𝘁𝘂𝗿𝗲 𝗞𝗶𝗰𝗸𝘀 𝗕𝗮𝗰𝗸 𝟮𝟬𝟮𝟰 in Aarhus!

Join us over two days in October as we bring together the brightest minds in the arts and culture industry for conversations about – and with – emerging cultural talents. This year, we focus on how we can create the right conditions for the future of work in the cultural sector for a new generation of artists, cultural creators, and creative entrepreneurs.

This year, we've divided the conference into two standalone days, which can be experienced either together or separately. Read more about the days below.


𝗗𝗔𝗬 #𝟭 - 𝗘𝗫𝗣𝗟𝗢𝗥𝗘 “𝗧𝗛𝗘 𝗚𝗥𝗢𝗪𝗧𝗛 𝗟𝗔𝗬𝗘𝗥” // 𝗙𝗥𝗢𝗡𝗧𝗟Ø𝗕𝗘𝗥𝗡𝗘 & 𝗦𝗬𝗗𝗛𝗔𝗩𝗘𝗡 🐛

Something is cooking in the Aarhusian cultural growth layer. The cultural scene in Aarhus is bubbling with energy and growth. On the first day of CKB, we invite you on an exploration of the city's dynamic growth layer. Get an inside look at the creative forces behind some of the leading and most progressive initiatives in the scene and meet the people behind these creative projects.

You can also look forward to exciting conversations about the emerging cultural scene across generations, and discussions on what happens when established institutions step in to support and collaborate with this growth layer. The day will end with a keynote by Esben Weile Kjær, followed by a magical community dinner organized by De 7 Munde and Kaosteater at the venue Turkis. You won’t want to miss this!

𝗗𝗔𝗬 #𝟮 - 𝗔 𝗡𝗔𝗧𝗜𝗢𝗡𝗔𝗟 𝗖𝗢𝗡𝗩𝗘𝗥𝗦𝗔𝗧𝗜𝗢𝗡 // 𝗜𝗡𝗦𝗧𝗜𝗧𝗨𝗧 𝗙𝗢𝗥 (𝗫) & 𝗚𝗢𝗗𝗦𝗕𝗔𝗡𝗘𝗡 🌍

After exploring the growth layer, we move the conference to Godsbanen on day 2. Here we invite you to a national conversation about – and with – the emerging cultural scene. How can we ensure that the creative emerging talents and small cultural actors will continue to have a place in the cities in the future?

You can look forward to meeting a number of prominent voices from both Denmark and abroad, who will set the stage for engaging conversations and break-out sessions. Together, we will explore how we can shape and influence the future of arts and culture, making it even more relevant to more people.


🔹 𝗞𝗘𝗬𝗡𝗢𝗧𝗘𝗦: Esben Weile Kjær (Artist), Emiko Gejic (Club Commission Berlin), Annesofie Norn (UN Live x Sounds Right).

🔹 𝗗𝗘𝗕𝗔𝗧𝗘𝗦: Anna Malzer (Mungo Park), Uffe Elbæk (Senior Troublemaker), Esben Danielsen (Cultural Analysis Institute), Rabih Azad-Ahmad (Aarhus Municipality’s Culture Mayor), Mathias Findalen (Tuborg Foundation), Thomas Kruse (Artist and Activist), Mads Peter Laursen (Institut for (X)), Camilla Aneto (Frontløberne), and many more.

🔹 𝗕𝗥𝗘𝗔𝗞𝗢𝗨𝗧 𝗦𝗘𝗦𝗦𝗜𝗢𝗡𝗦: Bikubenfonden x Kunstens Stemmer, DM - Kultur x KULTURAM, Aarhus Volume, ARoS, Kulbroen, Sydhans, Kulbroen, Club Curious, Teater Fluks, Kaospilot, Palmehaven & many more...



𝙎𝙚𝙚 𝙩𝙝𝙚 𝙛𝙪𝙡𝙡 𝙥𝙧𝙤𝙜𝙧𝙖𝙢 𝙖𝙩: http://www.culturekicksback.dk/

🎟 𝙏𝙞𝙘𝙠𝙚𝙩 𝙥𝙧𝙞𝙘𝙚𝙨
1-day tickets from 325-800 DKK

2-day tickets from 400-1200 DKK


💪 Culture Kicks Back 2024 is organized by Kulturens Selvstændige – a newly founded association of five of the country’s most progressive cultural platforms. Kulturens Selvstændige consists of: Frontløberne, Institut for (X), Filmhus Fyn, URBAN 13, and Villa Kultur.

🫶🏻 Culture Kicks Back 2024’s financial partners are Tuborgfondet and Aarhus Municipality.

💫 Content partners: DM Kultur x KULTURAM, Kulturens Analyseinstitut, Bikubenfonden.

🌟 Venuepartners Godsbanen and Turkis.

Warm regards,

Kulturens Selvstændige

483090304425159.name: Info meeting for new volunteers | Råhuset & Basement
483090304425159.formattedDate: Tuesday, September 3, 2024 at 5:00 PM – 6:00 PM CEST
483090304425159.description:
Råhuset and Basement are looking for new volunteers to join our community! 🙌🏽

We are looking for volunteers who are interested in working in our bar, entrance, as photographers or doing lights at our events at Råhuset and Basement. In the summer we furthermore have outdoor events at Onkel Dannys Plads. 🎪

At Råhuset and Basement we work with a wide range of music, art and cultural events. As a volunteer you get free access to events, discount in our bars, access to volunteer parties and activities and become a part of a diverse community of volunteers interested in music, art and culture.

Want to know more? Please press “attend” and show up at Råhuset Sep 3rd at 17.00-18:00!

Ready to sign up already? Sing up here: https://onkeldannysplads.kk.dk/bliv-frivillig

Feel free to contact our volunteer coordinator, Helene, at W26X@kk.dk for more information - also if you can't make it to the meeting.

📍 Råhuset, Onkel Dannys Plads 7
⏰ 17:00 - 18:00

We can't wait to meet you!
Sorry, you need to be at least 18 years old to volunteer.

🔗 Råhuset/Onkel Dannys Plads: https://onkeldannysplads.kk.dk/bliv-frivillig
🔗 Basement: https://basement.kk.dk/bliv-frivillig

842593854502393.name: Rockquizzen i Råhuset
842593854502393.description:
Rockquizzen er til dig, der elsker rockmusik i alle afskygninger, og som har lyst til at battle på viden med ligesindede musikelskere.

Vi går til rockhistorien i helt bred forstand. Det betyder, at du kan støde på musik og spørgsmål om både nyt og gammelt, hårdt og blødt, dansk og internationalt. Niveauet ligger et sted imellem ikke for svært, ikke for let.

Der er naturligvis gode præmier på højkant – de vil alle blive afsløret på quizaftenen. Selv hvis man er bedst til ikke at få point, kan man blive præmieret!

Det koster 60 kroner pr. person at deltage (du betaler ved ankomst), og I må være op til 5 personer på et hold.

Bemærk: Det er et must at reservere et bord, for der er rift om dem. Du booker et bord ved at skrive her på væggen. Angiv et holdnavn, og hvor mange I er. Først til mølle.

Vi glæder os til at se jer!

Kh. Christian og Anders

403084605633208.name: Klub Sigurd
403084605633208.description:
THE DEADLY SONS / THE GRAVES END / ESBEN AMDISEN

The Music Collective "Klub Sigurd" from Sigurdsgade Nørrebro is presenting bands on this thursday evening at Råhuset.

Øvelokalefællesskabet fra Sigurdsgade på Nørrebro overtager scenen på Råhuset denne torsdag.

Døre kl. 19.30
Koncert kl. 20.00

Entré 50 kr.

THE DEADLY SONS

The Deadly Sons har med deres mørke rock'n'roll taget publikum med storm ved deres liveoptrædender. I marts 2023 udgav de debutalbummet 'Common Love', som Gaffa gav fem stjerner.
The Deadly Sons har hverken til hensigt at genskabe en gammel lyd eller revolutionere med en ny genre. De spiller mørk rock'n'roll, hvor det oprørske og uregerlige hele tiden ligger og ulmer. I videoen til nummeret "Talk You Into This" opleves bandets insisterende og medrivende energi, der også er kendetegnende for bandets koncerter.

https://open.spotify.com/artist/33en9gNs0KvDBtkXHSb8Yg?si=OQKb8GpiTJu3ahx1evHOag

ESBEN AMDISEN

Esben Amdisen har siden 2014 været aktuel som solist. Først i følgeskab med backingbandet ”De blege mænd i sort”, men ofte også alene. Siden spillestederne åbnede op på ny i 2021 har Esben spillet live i følgeskab med Steffen Buhl Larsen på guitar. Det er på mange måder en meget traditionel sangskrivning man finder i Esbens sange. Det er personskildringer og beretninger fra en tilværelse, hvor døden, katastroferne og skyggerne altid lurer rundt om hjørnet. Men det er også sammenstødet mellem Esben og Steffen, der skaber en udefinerbar blanding af stemningsmættet folk og rock.

https://open.spotify.com/artist/3VviFjPFZ24r9YRaDsymoW?si=bF6IkfimSFOLtEyHltiG3A

THE GRAVES END

The Graves End from Copenhagen is a 4-piece rock band consisting of musicians from Poland,Australia,France, and Denmark. Inspired by the 60s 70s psychedelic rock, they are playing all original teacks and bringing the rock vibe back again. Enjoy the ride as you will be taken on a journey through their music

https://www.instagram.com/reel/C6lg0Scq3nK/?igsh=NTN0d2Q5czFpM3E5

3740759776244470.name: FØRSTE FREDAG - med Turkman Souljah og Per Vers | 6. september | Råhuset
3740759776244470.description:
Rapper Per Vers og DJ Turkman Souljah har stået på scenen sammen hundredevis af gange de seneste 10 år. Nu laver de fire helt særlige aftener på et af Københavns mest intime og mest centralt beliggende spillesteder.

Råhuset lægger hus til en månedligt tilbagevendende aften hvor alt er muligt og tilladt. Det er legestue for lyrik og lak. For turntables og tekster. For vinyl og vokal. For pladespilleri og poesi. 

FØRSTE FREDAG løber af stablen to fredage før og to fredage efter sommerferien. Hver koncert bliver helt forskellig fra den foregående, og hver gang vil der være nye gæster - rappere, sangere, instrumentalister og gøglere af første klasse fra de to eventyrlystne herrers kreative omgangskreds. 

Og så arbejder Turkman og Per på et fælles album, og hver aften vil der være premiere på nye numre derfra!

Kom forbi til en unik aften - eller fire! 


Om kunstnerne:
Per Vers er ubesejret dobbelt MC’s Fight Night champ, modtager af Dan Turéll medaljen, Modersmål-Prisen og har udgivet mere end 10 albums og spillet mere end 2500 koncerter.
https://vers.dk/
https://www.facebook.com/pvers

Turkman Souljah er ubesejret femdobbelt skandinavisk mester i DJ-mix og er siden da blevet Danmarks første Ph.D. med speciale i pladespiller!
https://turkmansouljah.com/
https://www.facebook.com/turkmansouljahmusic

490293710299138.name: Loksmith + Support: Astro-Lloyd & Second Wind
490293710299138.description:
Last time the band took to the stage of Råhuset, it was celebrating the release of their debut-EP "The Issue", and the venue was full. Now, nearly a year later, they return with swedish supports Astro-Lloyd and Second Wind to play a show for the lonely, the lovelorn, lovers of beer and lovers of music.

    Early Bird Presale: 100 DKK (+fee)
    Presale: 130 DKK (+fee)
    Door sale: 150 DKK (+ fee)
    -
    Date: 07.09.2024
    Doors: 19:30
    Show start: 20:00
    Place: Onkel Dannys Pl. 7

Loksmith writes songs for you who feels alone and wrong in a world where groups are increasingly polarised, and your attention and self-worth are bought and sold.
The band reaches out from Hillerød, Denmark, and reminds you that are not alone in these feelings - and that the solution is an inherent love for life.

Loksmith’s musical journey began in 2019 when Bastian Hobbs (Guitar, Vocals), Malte Andersen (Bass), Valdemar Hansen (Drums) and William Nielsen (Guitar, Backing vocals) met at Tølløse Privat-, og Efterskole and quickly started writing songs together.
The band’s sound is based in guitar-led rock, and is recognisable by cascading arpeggios, thumping rhythms, huge dynamic shifts, and melancholic vocals that spiral into hysterical falsetto.

In 2021, the band made it to the Danish finale of music competition Emergenza Festival. This introduced them to the Danish live scene as a tenacious and contagiously energetic group and proved one thing true: The real Loksmith experience is in-concert. They've since been playing to active crowds all over Copenhagen's underground rock scene, starting moshpits and waving smartphone flashlights.

In November 2023, Loksmith released their debut-EP "The Issue". The EP covers a wide range of sounds, going from stadium ballads to unrequited love songs without breaking your immersion, and serves as the band’s first big step in their career as rockstars.

https://open.spotify.com/artist/2xSkiwnfvaalElMVTOV1Yt?si=aYGD2Kj-SsqQvaMEn6THVw

Emerging from the late 2010's Stockholm underground scene, Second Wind has become somewhat of a classic wherever cheap beer and college students can be found. By fusing elements of alt and indie rock with flowery church piano or heavy, fuzzed basslines, they have created their own brand of powerful gloom rock which, coupled with melancholic lyrics and vocals, echoes the sort of resigned "party at the end of the world" sensation felt by young people all over the world today.

-

From their beginnings, rehearsing in a cramped, leaking attic studio in Stockholms artist quarters, to sold out basement bar gigs, college festivals and musical competitions, Second Wind has maintained their steady drum beats and guitar driven underground sound while experimenting with everything from feedback noises to saxophones. The wide span of musical influences causes every song to be simultaneously unique and vaguely familiar.

After finishing their 2022 fall tour, with a supporting gig for Junior Brielle, and as winners of Lidingö Rock, a new album combining tour hits with new material is in the works. Along with a loyal and growing fanbase everywhere there is a university bar, this means that Second Wind will continue to be a pulsating musical presence at underground venues all over Sweden and beyond.

https://open.spotify.com/artist/2MaZtWQK0XFfVPOnx6IKC1?si=-_FeISJoTj6DUJR58cMrdw

-

Astro-Lloyd is all about the love for music. The band is constantly seeking to widen their musical horizon by using inspiration from a variety of genres to create a unique sound and delivers energetic live performances. The biggest influences are found in Biffy Clyro’s lust to experiment and the arena choruses of Foo Fighters, topped off with the energy from bands like The Hives and Royal Republic.

Following up on their debut album ‘Astro-Life’ från 2017, the band released ’LOUD NOISES on June 2, 2023.

https://open.spotify.com/artist/2M7i48NN8KNVkNAku4Roj2?si=gQXHmQ9IRgG83_7c3U3DCg

Don't miss out on 3 excellent underground rock bands on September 7th - get your ticket now.

location.name: Onkel Dannys Plads 7, 1711 København V, Danmark

485746294348401.name: CineWine #42
485746294348401.formattedDate: Monday, September 9, 2024 at 6:45 PM – 9:45 PM CEST
485746294348401.description:
The coziest of movie screenings and indie cinema in Copenhagen.
If you are a person who enjoys wine and good movies, this is the event just for you!
September is starting our autumn time and we will have some semi-summer and semi-autumn evening :)

We are aiming to create a community of people that enjoy these two great "inventions", so why not enjoy them together?
This event is happening with the great help of Råhuset for renting the venue and providing for us.
Be sure of:
- great movies
- tasty wine
- good atmosphere
- like-minded people
- free snacks
Evenings have a laid-back and cozy atmosphere and we would encourage you to come along and bring your friends and close ones. By what we mean cozy also candles, pillows, and fatboys 😉
--------------------------------------------------------------------
PLEASE NOTE:
This is a place that is welcoming to people from all over the world, various sexualities, and religions. We want to discuss and exchange opinions in a civilized manner. Just wanted to point out that no matter who you are, you are welcome 🙂
--------------------------------------------------------------------
CineWine is an event that wants to encourage people to watch quality movies that hold significance for cinematography and aims to connect people - create a community feeling (in the midst of this individualistic society).
We have an FB group (CineWine CPH club), where we encourage attendees to join to get news and updates! - also for administration reasons, which will be explained during the event.

The link for the group is here: https://www.facebook.com/groups/289672311787100/
If you are up for supporting this non-profit session, share this on your Facebook, tell about this to your peers and network, but most importantly come!

If you have any other questions or ideas, please contact us.
on behalf of CineWine sessions

1002384788329856.name: SmutSlam Copenhagen: "FVCK AROUND AND FIND OUT" (Sept 10)
1002384788329856.description:
Smut Slam CPH: c'mon and dip your toes in!

Copenhagen's only community dirty storytelling open mic is kicking off our new season on Tuesday, Sept 10, with the theme "FVCK AROUND AND FIND OUT." Did you dive in instead of dipping your toe? Ignore your inner voice and your friends' advice? Go through an experiment and WOW what the hell just happened? Share stories of your hard-won wisdom and let the rest of us learn (or get some wild ideas of our own)!

Tickets: 130 dkk/early bird (eight tickets ONLY), 150/adv (available after early bird sells out, 25 tickets), 170/door
Available here: https://billetto.dk/e/smut-slam-copenhagen-billetter-1069499

Location: Råhuset, Onkel Dannys Pl. 7, 1711 København

GUEST JUDGES: TBA

** Prizes from dMasque and njoy toys!

SCHEDULE OF EVENTS 

18:30-19:30: browse the merch, get a drink, hang out on the patio while we still can! 

19:30-22:00: Smut Slam, in the old-fashioned way (with one short intermission)

Created and hosted by professional perv Cameryn Moore, the Smut Slam features real-life, first-person sex stories from the audience, stories from guests and sometimes even celebrity judges, and also readings from THE FUCKBUCKET, a convenient and funnily named receptacle for all your anonymous questions and confessions!

IMPORTANT: Smut Slam is queer-friendly, kink- AND vanilla-friendly, fat-friendly, sex worker-friendly, virgin-friendly, polyamory-friendly, we're really, really friendly. We welcome people with all types and amounts of sexual experiences. We DO NOT welcome stories or fuckbuckets involving racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia or any other kind of discrimination, or nonconsensual objectification or fetishization. All activities discussed must be CONSENSUAL.

WE PRACTICE SAFER SMUT! DO NOT ATTEND if you are feeling poorly! There will be more slams!

PLEASE NOTE: We have a strong Code of Conduct for everyone at a slam. We try very hard to run the event accordingly, and we want attendees to actually pay attention so you can help us create this safer space: https://docs.google.com/document/d/120FTNtC47HhNIEP91TXpUT21mwsDCryMsRhAj74nJjs/edit?usp=sharing Please do take a moment to read this statement, thank you!

ACCESSIBILITY: The venue has five steps at entry, and a few steps inside to bathroom level and additional seating.

1218252939523954.name: Opening Concert: The Bug feat. Flowdan (UK) + N.E.GIRL B2B Smokey + Mbizo at ALICE – VENTELISTE
1218252939523954.formattedDate: Friday, September 6, 2024 at 8:00 PM – 11:59 PM CEST
1218252939523954.description:
Bass-legenden The Bug og den Grammy-vindende rapper Flowdan skubber dub og dancehall til det yderste med kompromisløse beats og intense flows, når de sammen åbner ALICEs koncertsal på Nørre Allé med et kæmpe brag. Før og efter koncerten sørger hhv. Mbizo og N.E.GIRL B2B Smokey for tunge lækkerier til gulvet.

**Bemærk: Koncerten er udsolgt, men der er oprettet en venteliste man kan skrive sig på via vores hjemmeside. Står man på venteliste vil man få besked hvis vi får mulighed for at sætte flere billetter i salg.

⊛⊛⊛⊛⊛⊛⊛⊛⊛⊛⊛⊛⊛⊛⊛⊛⊛⊛⊛⊛⊛

Døre kl 20:00 / Show kl 21:00 / Luk: 02:00
Køb billet i forsalg: 200 dkk eksl. gebyr 
Køb billet: https://alicecph.com/event/opening-concert-the-bug-feat-flowdan-uk-n-e-girl-b2b-smokey-mbizo/
Lyt: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=b9_dD2wvhDI
NB: Koncerten er stående

SCROLL DOWN FOR ENGLISH

⊛⊛⊛⊛⊛⊛⊛⊛⊛⊛⊛⊛⊛⊛⊛⊛⊛⊛⊛⊛⊛

The Bug feat. Flowdan
The Bug (Kevin Richard Martin) er en uundgåelig legende og kæmpe karakter inden for baskultur. Den britiske elektroniske musiker og producer har siden 90’erne stået bag toneangivende grupper som Techno Animal, King Midas Sound og Zonal, og en lang række definerende projekter, som har forgrenet sig vidt og bredt, især inden for dub, dancehall, noise, grime og hip hop. Ikke mindst er The Bug kendt for sine mange feature-samarbejder som han beriger med tonstung bas og kompromisløse beats, og som har beriget musikscenen med fantastiske talenter. Et af de vigtigste og mest langvarige samarbejder har han haft med den efterhånden ligeså legendariske britiske rapper Flowdan.

Flowdan har baggrund i det indflydelsesrige grime-kollektiv Roll Deep, som rumsterede på London-scenen i starten af 00’erne, og er kendt for sine ru og rumlende vokaler, der ubesværet resonerer over dubstep, grime og junglebeats. Når The Bug og Flowdan danner alliance og skubber dub og dancehall til det yderste med intense flows og beats, sker der magiske ting. Fra Flowdans første samarbejde med The Bug har han stødt bevæget sig fra undergrunden mod toppen, og i februar i år blev Flowdan den første britiske rapper nogensinde til at vinde en Grammy for “Rumble” – hittet med mastodonten Skrillex, der har rystet TikTok såvel som dansegulve overalt.

Under sit navn Kevin Richard Martin spillede The Bug allersidste koncert på Nørre Allé inden Corona-nedlukningen i 2020, og siden har ALICE ikke været tilbage som normalt fungerende spillested på eget venue. Cirklen bliver derfor smukt fuldendt, når The Bug feat. Flowdan åbner ALICEs koncertsal på Nørre Allé 6. september.

N.E.GIRL B2B Smokey
Med seriøs inspiration fra sound system-kultur og alternative klubstilarter fra Storbritannien og den globale undergrund, har N.E.GIRL opbygget sig et ry for sin multi-genre-tilgang. Som klubpromotor og festivalkurator opererer hun med bas-drevne og eksperimenterende stilarter og udforsker konstant grænserne for multi-genre mixing. N.E.GIRL indtager denne aften gulvet B2B med den københavnske DJ Smokey, som siden sine spæde teenageår har dyrket sin utrættelige interesse i elektronisk musik. Med teknisk perfektionisme og fintfølende forståelse for stemning, fletter hun ubesværet tracks sammen på tværs af genrer og tidsperioder, og jonglerer dugfriske dubplates med ældgamle juveler.

Mbizo
Mbizo er en Nørrebro-born-and-raised producer og DJ, hvis musik trækker kraftigt på sound system- og bas-kultur. Siden hans debut i 2019 har han fået anerkendelse for sit take på dub-musik og fyldt mange dansegulve rundt omkring.

⊛⊛⊛⊛⊛⊛⊛⊛⊛⊛⊛⊛⊛⊛⊛⊛⊛⊛⊛⊛⊛

In English:

The legendary bass-heavy opening blast on Nørre Allé is brought to you by Bass legend The Bug and Grammy-winning rapper Flowdan, pushing dub and dancehall to the extreme with uncompromising beats and intense flows as they jointly open ALICE’s concert hall on Nørre Allé with a huge bang. Before and after the concert, respectively, Mbizo and N.E.GIRL B2B Smokey ensure heavy delights for the dance floor.

The Bug feat. Flowdan
The Bug (Kevin Richard Martin) is an inevitable legend and giant figure within bass culture. The British electronic musician and producer has been behind influential groups since the 90s such as Techno Animal, King Midas Sound, and Zonal, as well as a plethora of defining projects that have branched out widely, especially within dub, dancehall, noise, grime, and hip hop. Notably, The Bug is known for his many feature collaborations, enriching them with heavy bass and uncompromising beats, and enriching the music scene with fantastic talents. One of the most important and enduring collaborations he has had is with the now equally legendary British rapper Flowdan.

Flowdan has roots in the influential grime collective Roll Deep, which stirred up the London scene in the early 2000s and is known for his rough and rumbling vocals that effortlessly resonate over dubstep, grime, and jungle beats. When The Bug and Flowdan form an alliance and push dub and dancehall to the extreme with intense flows and beats, magical things happen. Since Flowdan’s first collaboration with The Bug, he has moved from the underground towards the top, and in February of this year, Flowdan became the first British rapper ever to win a Grammy for “Rumble” – the hit with the mammoth Skrillex, which has shaken TikTok as well as dance floors everywhere.

Under his real name, Kevin Richard Martin, The Bug played his very last concert on Nørre Allé before the Corona lockdown in 2020, and since then, ALICE has not returned as a normally functioning venue. Therefore, the circle is beautifully completed when The Bug feat. Flowdan opens ALICE’s concert hall on Nørre Allé on September 6.

N.E.GIRL B2B Smokey
With serious inspiration from sound system culture and alternative club styles from the UK and the global underground, N.E.GIRL has built a reputation for her multi-genre approach. As a club promoter and festival curator, she operates with bass-driven and experimental styles and constantly explores the boundaries of multi-genre mixing. This evening, N.E.GIRL takes over the floor B2B with Copenhagen DJ Smokey, who since her early teenage years has cultivated her tireless interest in electronic music. With technical perfectionism and a sensitive understanding of mood, she effortlessly weaves tracks together across genres and time periods, juggling fresh dubplates with ancient jewels.

Mbizo
Mbizo is a Nørrebro-born-and-raised producer and DJ whose music heavily draws on sound system and bass culture. Since his debut in 2019, he has gained recognition for his take on dub music and filled many dance floors around.

1108252157107855.name: Opening Party: Lyra Valenza & Signe Dige + DJ G2G + Dziffi at ALICE – UDSOLGT
1108252157107855.formattedDate: Saturday, September 7, 2024 at 8:00 PM – 11:59 PM CEST
1108252157107855.description:
UDSOLGT
*Det er muligt at skrive sig på venteliste via vores hjemmeside*

ALICE vender hjem og indvier Nørre Allé med en elektronisk åbningsfest af dimensioner, når et gakket kontemporært elektronisk lineup spiller salen op på tværs af hektiske visuals, højenergiske genremix og sample-tunge tracks. Lyra Valenza & Signe Dige, DJ G2G og Dziffi sørger for, at det eneste du kan gøre er at danse.

⊛⊛⊛⊛⊛⊛⊛⊛⊛⊛⊛⊛⊛⊛⊛⊛⊛⊛⊛⊛⊛

Døre kl 20:00 / Show kl 21:00 / Luk: 02:00
Køb billet i forsalg: 100 dkk eksl. gebyr 
Køb billet: https://alicecph.com/event/opening-party-lyra-valenza-dj-g2g-dziffi/
Lyt: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xQ_UbwyJDWk
NB: Koncerten er stående

SCROLL DOWN FOR ENGLISH

⊛⊛⊛⊛⊛⊛⊛⊛⊛⊛⊛⊛⊛⊛⊛⊛⊛⊛⊛⊛⊛

Lyra Valenza & Signe Dige
Lyra Valenza (aka Jens Konrad og Hjalte) skaber pulserende tæpper af skæv elektronik der sitrer i et virvar af jungle, footwork-ekstravaganza, højhastigheds-hardcore og glasklare futuristiske trance-atmosfærer. Den københavnske duo er elsket på dansegulvet og berygtet på den elektroniske scene for deres sample-tunge tracks og energiske liveoptrædener. De har bl.a. udgivet på deres eget Petrola 80-label og Posh Isolation. Denne aften præsenterer de et nyt AV-show med videokunstner Signe Dige. Lyra Valenza har spillet et utal af gange på ALICE siden spillestedet åbnede i 2018, så der bliver god hjertevarm og knækket husorkesterstemning, når de indtager gulvet til den store genåbningsfest på Nørre Allé!

DJ G2G
DJ G2G er en dansk/uruguayansk kunstner, producer og DJ. Gennem deres energiske, legende, sjove og eksperimentelle tilgang til at blande genrer og referencer til populær internetkultur, har de skabt deres egen karakteristiske signatur. DJ G2Gs set vidner om deres uruguayanske og danske arv og splicer på finurlig vis moderne latin-klublyde som perreo, cumbia og guaracha sammen med de dybe europæiske dansemusiktraditioner. Forvent et banging set når DJ G2G går på.

Dziffi
Den København-baserede norsk-ghanesiske DJ Dziffi medbringer yndlingssange til at forsøde aftenen, med inspiration fra en kærlighed til uptempo elektroniske genrer og samtidsmusik fra det globale syd. Forvent alt på kryds og tværs af genrer, nostalgiske melodier samt højenergiske og eklektiske sammensætninger. Dziffi spillede et fantastisk set som support til Nídia og DJ Marfox på ALICE sidste år.

⊛⊛⊛⊛⊛⊛⊛⊛⊛⊛⊛⊛⊛⊛⊛⊛⊛⊛⊛⊛⊛

In English:

ALICE returns home and inaugurates Nørre Allé with an electronic opening party of dimensions, as an eclectic contemporary electronic lineup takes the stage, spanning hectic visuals, high-energy genre mixes, and sample-heavy tracks. Lyra Valenza, DJ G2G, and Dziffi ensure that all you can do is dance.
Lyra Valenza & Signe Dige

Lyra Valenza (aka Jens Konrad and Hjalte) creates pulsating tapestries of quirky electronics that fizz in a whirlwind of jungle, footwork extravaganza, high-speed hardcore, and crystal-clear futuristic trance atmospheres. The Copenhagen duo is beloved on the dance floor and notorious in the electronic scene for their sample-heavy tracks and energetic live performances. They have released music on their own Petrola 80 label and Posh Isolation, among others. This evening they present a new AV show featuring video artist Signe Dige. Lyra Valenza has played countless times at ALICE since the venue opened in 2018, so expect a warm-hearted and crackling house party atmosphere when they take the floor at the grand reopening on Nørre Allé!

DJ G2G
DJ G2G is a Danish/Uruguayan artist, producer, and DJ. Through their energetic, playful, fun, and experimental approach to blending genres and referencing popular internet culture, they have created their own distinctive signature. DJ G2G’s sets showcase their Uruguayan and Danish heritage, cleverly splicing modern Latin club sounds like perreo, cumbia, and guaracha with deep European dance music traditions. Expect a banging set when DJ G2G takes the stage.

Dziffi
Copenhagen-based Norwegian-Ghanaian DJ Dziffi brings favorite tunes to sweeten the evening, drawing inspiration from a love for uptempo electronic genres and contemporary music from the global south. Expect a mix of genres, nostalgic melodies, and high-energy, eclectic compositions. Dziffi delivered a fantastic set as support for Nídia and DJ Marfox at ALICE last year.

1116790692876093.name: VÍÍK at ALICE
1116790692876093.formattedDate: Sunday, September 8, 2024 at 7:00 PM – 10:00 PM CEST
1116790692876093.description:
Vitalt og vedkommende take på de nordiske folkemusiktraditioner leveres af den pan-skandinaviske stjernegruppe VÍÍK. Med den karismatiske norske sangerinde Elisabeth Vik i front, forener de skønheden og vildskaben i de ældgamle skikke og blænder op for en folkemusikalsk fest i åbningsugen på Nørre Allé.

⊛⊛⊛⊛⊛⊛⊛⊛⊛⊛⊛⊛⊛⊛⊛⊛⊛⊛⊛⊛⊛

Døre kl 19:00 / Show kl 20:00
Køb billet i forsalg: 160 dkk eksl. gebyr 
Køb billet: https://alicecph.com/event/viik/
Lyt: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8Q6553HZGyc
NB: Koncerten er stående

SCROLL DOWN FOR ENGLISH

⊛⊛⊛⊛⊛⊛⊛⊛⊛⊛⊛⊛⊛⊛⊛⊛⊛⊛⊛⊛⊛

"Ny nordisk folk, når det er bedst”, skrev Gaffa meget rammende om den pan-skandinaviske supergruppe VÍÍK. I front har gruppen den norske sanger og komponist Elisabeth Vik, der på karismatisk vis leder publikum ind i et fortryllende univers af mystiske middelalderballader, sagn og eventyr. Hun bakkes op af et skandinavisk stjernehold bestående af Annelene Toft (violin) og Jakob Kragesand (kontrabas) fra Danmark, samt Espen Wensaas (cittern) og Håkon Berre fra Norge. Rutinerede og legesyge musikere, der sammen gør folkemusikkens rødder levende og vedkommende.

Gruppen har de seneste år markeret sig stærkt som live-navn, bl.a. i Tivoli, på Celtic Connections og på Roskilde Festival i 2022, hvor de høstede 5/6 stjerner i Gaffa for deres dragende og velspillede koncert, og deres evne til at forene skønheden og vildskaben i folkmusikken. VÍÍK er netop aktuelle med albummet “Sagt” (2024), Det er svært ikke at lade sig rive med, når de seks forrygende musikere spiller op. Vi glæder os til en folkemusikalsk fest af de dimensioner, når VÍÍK indtager ALICE søndag aften i åbningsugen på Nørre Allé.

Sagt om VÍÍK
“Nordisk urkraft. Ny nordisk folk, når det er bedst. Hvis Game of Thrones havde været en nordisk mytologisk serie, så ville VÍÍK være musikken, der passede til”– Gaffa

⊛⊛⊛⊛⊛⊛⊛⊛⊛⊛⊛⊛⊛⊛⊛⊛⊛⊛⊛⊛⊛

In English:

A vital and engaging interpretation of Nordic folk music traditions is delivered by the pan-Scandinavian group VÍÍK. Led by the charismatic Norwegian singer Elisabeth Vik, they blend the beauty and wildness of ancient customs, creating a folk music celebration during the opening week of Nørre Allé.

"New Nordic folk at its best," wrote Gaffa very aptly about the pan-Scandinavian supergroup VÍÍK. At the forefront of the group is the Norwegian singer and composer Elisabeth Vik, who charismatically leads the audience into an enchanting universe of mysterious medieval ballads, legends, and fairy tales. She is supported by a Scandinavian star team consisting of Annelene Toft (violin) and Jakob Kragesand (double bass) from Denmark, as well as Espen Wensaas (cittern) and Håkon Berre from Norway. Experienced and playful musicians who together bring the roots of folk music to life and make them relevant."

The group has made a strong mark as a live act in recent years, including performances in Tivoli, at Celtic Connections, and at the Roskilde Festival in 2022, where they received 5 out of 6 stars from Gaffa for their captivating and well-played concert, showcasing their ability to blend the beauty and wildness of folk music. VÍÍK is currently promoting their album “Sagt” (2024). It’s hard not to get carried away when these six fantastic musicians take the stage. We look forward to a folk music celebration of epic proportions when VÍÍK takes over ALICE on Sunday evening during the opening week on Nørre Allé.

Said about VÍÍK
“Nordic primal power. New Nordic folk at its best. If Game of Thrones had been a Nordic mythological series, VÍÍK would be the music that fits” – Gaffa

473414711782307.name: Nebula: Give The Drummer Some at ALICE
473414711782307.formattedDate: Monday, September 9, 2024 at 7:00 PM – 10:00 PM CEST
473414711782307.description:
Hvordan lyder det, når seks trommeslagere mødes i en symbiose af slagne takter og frie toner? Kollektivet Nebula præsenterer ‘Give The Drummer Some’ – en koncert for de seks fremragende herboende trommeslagere Anja Jacobsen, Simin Stine Ramezanali, Siv Øyunn, Ying-Hsueh Chen, Rune Kielsgaard og Frederik Bülow, som sammen vil improvisere et storslået indvielsesritual for ALICEs koncertsal på Nørre Allé.

⊛⊛⊛⊛⊛⊛⊛⊛⊛⊛⊛⊛⊛⊛⊛⊛⊛⊛⊛⊛⊛

Døre kl 19:00 / Show kl 20:00
Køb billet i forsalg: 130 dkk eksl. gebyr 
Køb billet: https://alicecph.com/event/nebula-give-the-drummer-some/
